metadata.title: CVE-2021-39685 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In various setup methods of the USB gadget subsystem, there is a possibleout of bounds write due to an incorrect flag check. This could lead tolocal escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-210292376References: Upstreamkernel

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
